name: Crispy Roast
desc: Large chunks of roasted meat. Small square grids are sliced into the meat skin before it is marinated, then placed in the oven — everyday ingredients, simple preparation, authentic flavor.

customize.name: Recipe: Crispy Roast
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Crispy Roast.

customize.name: Delicious Crispy Roast
customize.desc: Large chunks of roasted meat. The moment it comes out of the oven, the rich, meaty aroma fills your soul. No wonder so many people from Nod-Krai say this roasted meat is like the warm sun when the cold falls and the biting winds blow.

customize.name: Suspicious Crispy Roast
customize.desc: Large chunks of roasted meat. Swiftly snatched from the choking black smoke, the roasted meat looks more like charcoal. Before the embers in the grill have faded, it's worth trying to make another batch.

customize.name: Crispy Roast
customize.desc: Large chunks of roasted meat. Small square grids are sliced into the meat skin before it is marinated, then placed in the oven — everyday ingredients, simple preparation, authentic flavor.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Smetana
customize.desc: A dairy product produced through complex processes such as separation and fermentation. It has a smooth texture and a refreshing sourness, often serving as the finishing touch in many dishes.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
